eeta amatharawa wiharasthana naga situwima pasal ha piriwen pusthakala pahasukam diyunu kirima aadi samaja sewa rashiyak shri lanka agonshu mithrathwa padanama haraha sidu kare.mewara soyiyu kiriyama mahanahimi janmadina samarumata shri lanka agonshu mithrathwa padaname samajika himiwarun wana bopitiye wijitha nahimi, gulawita siriniwasa nahimi, uurumuththe sugathananda himi, makandure sirirathana himi, oomare kassapa himi, badigama nandasiri himi, lelwala samitha himi ha uurugamuwe assaji himiyan saha ema padaname adhyaksha janaral somasiri ee.

“aandukama wya ma wyawastha mandalaya pathkirima sandaha yojana sammathaya wastha mandalaya pathkirima sandaha yojana sammathaya shri lankawata aandukama wyawasthawak sammatha kara gatha yuthu yayi shri lankika janathawa athara pulul ekangathawayak athi ෙhayin da shri lankawa sandaha aandukama wyawasthawak sakas kirima pilibandawa salaka bala janathaweg adahas ha upedas labaegana aandukama wyawasthaew 75 wana wyawasthawa yateth ee ෙwatha pawari athi balathala kiyathmaka karamin parliemnthuwa wisin salaka balanu pinisa aandukama wyawastha panath ෙkatumpathak sakasiem karya sandaha samastha parliemnthuwama samanwitha wana paridi sadi purna karaka sabhawaka balathala athi ha parliemnthu manthiwarayanegan samanwithawana mehi min mathu “aandukama wyawastha mandalaya” yanuwen handunwanu labana parlimenthu karaka sabhawak thibiya yuthu yayi, mema parliemnthuwa yojana sammatha karayi.
